short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for quick search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Search is a simple extension that provides users with a quick and easy way to search for information on their favorite search engines. With a user-friendly interface this extension allows users to choose from a variety of popular search engines including Google, Bing, Yahoo etc.

Once users have selected their desired search engine, they can enter their search term into the search box and hit the search button to see the results. The extension will automatically redirect the user to their selected search engine and display the results on another tab.

Quick Search also comes with a dark mode feature, which users can activate by checking the "Dark mode" checkbox in the extension popup. This feature can reduce eye strain and make searching more comfortable, especially in low-light environments.

Quick Search is an essential extension for anyone who frequently searches online. Its intuitive design and customizable search options make it a must-have tool for anyone who wants to improve their search experience.
